pages.title: Alchemist's Grace
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 5 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Upon attacking entities, grants potion effects. $(br)Also grants potion effects upon mining. $(br)Effects can be similar. $(br)Values can be different from pack to pack
